pages.name: New Ore Damashii
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#new_ore_ghost_eyecon)New Ore Ghost Eyecon$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider New Ghost
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost: Final Stage (2017, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/new_ghost_driver)Ghost Driver (New Ghost)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Strength V
